Lars Clausen wrote:

> On Tue, 2005-01-25 at 20:10, stack wrote:
> > Lars Clausen wrote:
> >
>
> Bjarne got the newest HEAD into our framework and saw an incredible
> improvement, it now seems to use about 5MB per job instead of 100.  This
> is way more workable, and solves our problems for now.  Thank you!  In
> case you or others want to look more closely at it, below is a list of
> how many new objects came out of 10 crawls (after 2 crawls to get a
> base).

Thank you for the below list of heap objects and for the jb2works 
suggestion. I'll try it.
Yours,
St.Ack
